Headline: #9 Ashland Temporary Southbound Reroute near Irving Park to Fullerton
ShortDescription: SB 9 Ashland rr via Ashland, Lawrence, Marine Dr, In Lake Shore, Sheridan, Cannon, Fullerton, O Lake Shore & norm rt due to blockage from Irving Pk to Fullerton

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Southbound #9 Ashland buses are temporarily rerouted via Ashland, Lawrence, Marine Drive, Inner Lake Shore Drive, Sheridan, Cannon, Fullerton, Outer Lake Shore Drive, then resume their normal route due to street blockage between Irving Park and Fullerton.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Red Line Delays
ShortDescription: Red Line trains are running w/residual delays due track switching issues at Howard. Service is resuming, allow extra time.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Red Line trains are running w/residual delays due to track switching issues at Howard. 

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #79 79th Temporary Reroute at 79th/Maryland
ShortDescription: 79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via  79th, Greenwood, 76th, Cottage Grove and 79th: due to, street blockage near 79th/Maryland.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
#79 79th buses are temporarily rerouted via  79th, Greenwood, 76th, Cottage Grove and 79th: due to, street blockage near 79th/Maryland.
